## Evidence Checklist (required)

- [ ] **What changed?** (one paragraph)
- [ ] **Claim(s) updated:** list claim IDs (e.g., C3, H2)
- [ ] **Reproduction command(s):** (paste exact commands)
- [ ] **Run ID(s):** (e.g., r20260223-120012-abcd)
- [ ] **Artifact paths:** (run_dir, metrics.json, logs, plots)
- [ ] **WORKING_MEMORY updated:** yes/no
- [ ] **HANDOFF_LOG appended:** yes/no
- [ ] **NEGATIVE_RESULTS updated (if applicable):** yes/no

### Notes
- Any limitations, failure cases, or surprises?
